text: Gradinje () is a village in the Istria County, Croatia. Administratively it belongs to the municipality of Cerovlje. Until recently, the village was inhabited by Istro-Romanians who could speak the Istro-Romanian language. == Population == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 0.5em auto; text-align: center;" |- ! colspan="16" | Population number according to the census |- | 1857 || 1869 || 1880 || 1890 || 1900 || 1910 || 1921 || 1931 || 1948 || 1953 || 1961 || 1971 || 1981 || 1991 || 2001 || 2011 |- | 279 || 288 || 260 || 266 || 270 || 277 || 266 || 267 || 233 || 204 || 130 || 102 || 74 || 58 || 43 || 43 |- |} == References == == External links == *Official homepage of Cerovlje Category:Populated places in Istria County
title: Gradinje, Cerovlje
